mapper.sql: select u.admin_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.pwd_update_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_admin u left join sys_admin_role ur on u.admin_id = ur.admin_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select:
